body.query: FROM events | eval ip_str = mv_concat("invalid_", to_string(ip)) | ENRICH networks-policy ON ip_str | sort @timestamp | KEEP ip, name, department, message

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-7501b0469826f1e8e1c9e9cc16aae15fd5b093b4 "Line 1:68: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'invalid_' is not an IP string literal."
